column1: INTERGASTRA 2024 – The Planning picks up speed!;"ATTENTION: This is an external email. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe.

The flame for the art of cooking will be lit again in exactly 261 days on the grounds of Messe Stuttgart. Chefs from all over the world compete at the IKA/Culinary Olympics and cook in a fair competition for gold
column3: as well as the recognition of the entire industry. The 26th IKA will take place from 2 to 7 February 2024 and for the second time in parallel with INTERGASTRA - the leading trade fair for the hotel and gastronomy business.

column1: Which teams will compete against each other on which competition days was decided by the lucky draw. In addition to regional teams and individual exhibitors
column2: teams from around 40 countries compete in various competitions at the IKA/Culinary Olympics in the categories National
column3: Junior National and Community Catering Teams.

column1: Which cooking teams are competing against each other and further information about IKA can be found here: The Competition Days for the 26th IKA/Culinary Olympics Are Set
The planning  for INTERGASTRA 2024 is well under way and picks up speed. The hall planning for your perfect stage is in progress and the first placement suggestions have been sent out.
Not registered yet? To secure your favourite stand placement
Find more reasons to participate here:
Good to know: Your registration remains unbinding in the first phase. A binding contract is only concluded when you have received our placement proposal
column2: confirmed it and subsequently received a stand confirmation.

column1: We would be delighted to see you again. If you have any questions
column2: we are of course always there for you.

column1: You can object at any time to advertising from Landesmesse Stuttgart GmbH. For this purpose
column2: please send an e-mail to widerspruch@messe-stuttgart.de. For an objection
column3: no costs will be incurred other than the transmission costs in accordance with the basic tariffs. You can find information on the use of your data at  www.messe-stuttgart.de/en/data-protection-declaration.
